plot: Batas Sa Aking Kamay is a 1987 action film directed by Mike Relon Makiling. Starring Fernando Poe Jr (FPJ), Eddie Garcia, Charo Santos, Mario Montenegro, Zandro Zamora
title: Batas sa aking kamay
